title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.2 - Function of the violation hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.2 - Function of the violation hearing

State Regulations

The purpose of the violation hearing shall be to hear and
determine allegations of rule violations contained in the misbehavior reports
referred for violation hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
252.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
